title: Doomsayer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select three players each night and attempt to guess their roles.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you correctly guess the roles of all three players, they will be dealt an Astral Unstoppable Attack.
- ~~After successfully Dooming three players, you will leave the Town in victory.~~
- Guessing a player's role bypass Jail.
- You cannot guess Town Investigative roles.
- If there are less than 3 other players alive you will die of Doom.
